name: Mind Tilt
description:
Mind Tilt is a ball physics game where you control the tilt of the level to move a ball to the bottom middle of the screen. You are the imagination of a kid who is worried about growing up. In time, his thoughts become more complicated, and his imagination finds it harder and harder to exit his mind. Rattle his head to allow his imagination to escape!

Controls:
Left and Right Arrow or A and D

Escape to pause
